author: _shemnon
content: Can we attach "Gas schedule abstraction" to this as well?  A piece of EVM code that when given the input parameters will return a single 256-bit word that is the gas cost for that call?

author: _shemnon
content: Thus all future precompile proposals can be defined as EVM code that has the canonical execution and EVM code that has the canonical costing.  Clients can substitute in faster logic, cross-compile the code, or just leave it as interpreted.

author: .vbuterin
content: I guess that would be doable in EOF? A contract code section, banned for regular creates, that just computes and outputs the gas cost
